meanings.definition: A type of seaweed used in food products for its gelling properties.
meanings.sent1: The chef added carrageen to the dessert to make it thicker.
meanings.sent2: The carrageen was essential in making the jelly set properly.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kids tried to prank their friend by hiding carrageen in his drink.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter had a carrageen-like quality, spreading and enveloping everyone around.
meanings.sent5: The carrageen shimmered in the sunlight, like a magical ingredient in the recipe.

meanings.definition: A gelatinous substance derived from carrageen seaweed, used as a thickening agent in food products.
meanings.sent1: The recipe called for a spoonful of carrageen to thicken the sauce.
meanings.sent2: When heated, the carrageen turned into a thickening agent for the soup.
meanings.sent3: The kids were amazed by how the carrageen transformed the watery mixture into a thick paste.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like carrageen, solidifying her resolve in the face of challenges.
meanings.sent5: The carrageen clung to the spoon, promising a velvety texture to the dish.
